titles.title: Health Professionals State Loan Repayment Tax Relief Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a Federal income tax exclusion for assistance provided to participants in State student loan programs for certain health professionals.
Health Professionals State Loan Repayment Tax Relief Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Health Professionals State Loan Repayment Tax Relief Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the tax exclusion for payments under federal and state health service loan repayment or loan forgiveness programs to include payments under other state programs that are intended to provide increased health care services in underserved or health professional shortage areas.
